rules.rationale: Tables whose entire description is just 'Subject ID' or similar contain only participant/sample identifiers with no phenotype data.
Tables describing consent groups map participants to data access tiers (e.g. GRU, HMB). Description explicitly mentions 'consent'.
rules.description: e.g. 'CARe_CHS_Subject - Consent Information', 'DCCT EDIC subject consent'

rules.rationale: dbGaP convention: tables ending in '_Subject' (e.g. ARIC_Subject, CHS_Subject) contain only subject IDs and minimal demographics.
dbGaP convention: tables ending in '_Sample' or '_Sample_Attributes' contain sample IDs and basic attributes (tissue type, analyte).
rules.description: e.g. 'This data table contains a mapping of study subject IDs to sample IDs.'
